metadata.name: Color Control
metadata.description:
8000x9000 300dpi
Created with Stable Diffusion, GiMP, Adobe Fresco, and a stylus made from an old paintbrush.

This is a representation of my Mother. I hid her face behind layers of color until she was almost unrecognizable, the same as my Mother has done for so many years. She's still beautiful, but she used to sing. I haven't heard her sing since I was very young. She's hidden herself beneath so many layers that her voice is gone.
